activities: Discovery Communications, LLC ("Discovery") uses personal information concerning current, former, and prospective personnel in connection with the management and operation of Discovery, human resources administration, and safety and security processes. Discovery uses personal information concerning current, former, and prospective vendors and service providers to manage its supply chain and business administration activities.
